description:
This Modular Proximity Switch utilises many of our proven proximity switches and integrates them with a, SEA CONÂ® Micro WET-CON, underwater Mateable connector.

Installation has never been easier. Once the switch is mounted the cable can easily be added. Because a wet-mateable connector is used, this can be done in any conditions, even submerged.

As a result of this modular design, switches become interchangeable. Simply replace the cable and the switch can be used elsewhere. This is particularly useful when taking spares to sea.

The steel reinforced Neoprene mould makes this product extremely durable.
